casebody.data:
Ronald F. BOZELKO
v.
STATEWIDE CONSTRUCTION, INC., et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided January 31, 2018

Ronald F. Bozelko, self-represented, in support of the petition.

The plaintiff's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court (AC 40459) is dismissed.

*1160KAHN, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
